Hey mans, I want to remove sudo and all its vestiges (no gksudo, gksu). How may I do this?
I mean, gksu instead of gksudo

That's nice to know, but I don't want my users to be able to execute things as root. I also want to be allowed to use the graphical utilities by piping through gksu instead of gksudo. How can this not be supported? Ubuntu is so crazy
